newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's KFA to seek 12,000T wheat bran pellet.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's KFA to seek 12,000T wheat bran pellet.

text.p: South Korea's Korea Feed Association (KFA) has invited tenders for 12,000 tonnes of wheat bran pellet by 11.30 a.m. (0230 GMT) on Thursday, traders said.
Traders said shipment was set for January 1-20 if sourced from China or for November 21-December 10 if from South America.
Arrival was slated for January 20 to the port cities of Inchon and Ulsan.
